mapper.select: SELECT u.user_id AS userId, u.email, u.username, u.password, u.enabled FROM users u WHERE u.email = #{email}
SELECT r.role_cd FROM roles r INNER JOIN user_roles ur ON r.role_cd = ur.role_cd WHERE ur.user_id = #{userId}

SELECT DISTINCT p.permission_cd FROM permissions p INNER JOIN role_permissions rp ON p.permission_cd = rp.permission_cd INNER JOIN user_roles ur ON rp.role_cd = ur.role_cd WHERE ur.user_id = #{userId}
